般若経: (はんにゃぎょう) - Prajnaparamita Sutra; Wisdom Sutras
般若面: (はんにゃづら) - (はんにゃめん only) noh mask of a grinning, horned demoness (represents a woman's rage and jealousy); dreadful face (esp. of a woman driven mad by jealousy)/terrifying facial expression
舳先: (へさき) - bow (e.g. of a ship); prow
舳艫千里: (じくろせんり) - (yoji) a large number of ships sailing in a long chain-like formation
舵を切る: (かじをきる) - to turn the rudder of a ship; to change direction (of policy, etc.)
舵を取る: (かじをとる) - to steer a ship; to manage/to take command/to take the helm
舵付き: (かじつき) - coxed (rowing); having a coxswain
舵棒: (かじぼう) - shafts (of rickshaws or similar vehicles)/thills; tiller/yoke
舶来品: (はくらいひん) - imported article; imported goods
舷: (gen) - estralé, lateral de um barco, estralé
舷灯: (げんとう) - running lights; sidelight; side light
船: (sen/fune) - boat , ship, boat, watercraft, vessel, steamship; tank, tub, vat, trough; counter for boat-shaped containers (e.g. of sashimi)
船だまり: (ふなだまり) - harbour; harbor; haven; anchorage; a moorage
船に乗る: (ふねにのる) - to board a ship
船の腹: (ふねのはら) - belly of a boat
船べり: (ふなべり) - side of a boat; gunwale
船をこぐ: (ふねをこぐ) - to row a boat; to nod off/to doze off
船を漕ぐ: (ふねをこぐ) - to row a boat; to nod off/to doze off
船中: (せんちゅう) - on board a ship
船乗り: (ふなのり) - getting on board; sailor/seaman
船乗りになる: (ふなのりになる) - to go to sea; to become a sailor
船便: (ふなびん) - surface mail (ship)/sea mail; ferry service/steamer service
船倉: (ふなぐら) - boathouse; (ふなぐら only) ship's hold/hatch
船側: (せんそく) - side of a ship
船側渡し: (せんそくわたし) - free alongside ship; FAS
船内通話装置: (せんないつうわそうち) - (esp. in ships)  intercom; intercommunication system
船出: (ふなで) - setting sail; putting out to sea
船名: (せんめい) - name of a vessel
船員労働委員会: (せんいんろうどういいんかい) - Labour Relations Commission for Seafarers
船団: (せんだん) - fleet (fishing, naval, etc.); convoy; group of ships
船型: (せんけい) - type of vessel; design of a ship
船外モーター: (せんがいモーター) - outboard motor
船守り: (ふなもり) - boat watchman; watching over a boat
船宿: (ふなやど) - shipping agent; boathouse; inn for sailors
船床: (ふなどこ) - a boat's floorboards; ship's hold
船庫: (せんこ) - boathouse; (ふなぐら only) ship's hold/hatch
船影: (ふなかげ) - sign of a ship (e.g. through fog, silhouette, etc.); outline of a ship
船待ち: (ふなまち) - waiting for a ship to depart
船板: (ふないた) - (ship or shipbuilding) timber or plank
船板塀: (ふないたべい) - fence made from disused ship planks
船架: (せんか) - slipway; cradle used on a slipway for launch or repair of small ships
船枻: (ふなだな) - planking (on a wooden ship)
船棚: (ふなだな) - planking (on a wooden ship)
船橋: (せんきょう) - pontoon bridge/temporary bridge made using ships; (せんきょう only) bridge (of a ship)
船歌: (ふなうた) - sailor's song; boat song; shanty
船渡し: (ふなわたし) - ferry; free on board/FOB
船溜まり: (ふなだまり) - harbour; harbor; haven; anchorage; a moorage
